en-US.summary: Listen to Voice of America Headline News.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open Voice of America Headline News
Alexa, play Voice of America Headline News
Alexa, ask Voice of America Headline News to play
en-US.name: Voice of America Headline News
en-US.description:
Listen to Voice of America Headline News.

Voice of America Headline News provides international headlines 24/7.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Voice of America Headline News" or "Alexa, play Voice of America Headline News" to start the broadcast".

At anytime, you can stop the broadcast by saying "Alexa, stop"
